scripts.start: bunx concurrently "bun run backend:dev" "bun run frontend:dev"
scripts.backend:dev: cd backend && bunx prisma generate && bun run dev
scripts.build: bunx concurrently "bun run backend:build" "bun run frontend:build"
scripts.test: bunx concurrently "bun run backend:test" "bun run frontend:test"
scripts.seed: cd backend && bunx prisma generate && bun prisma/seeds/folder.ts && bun prisma/seeds/file.ts
scripts.migrate: cd backend && bunx prisma generate && bunx prisma migrate dev
